title: Jeremy Renner's ex-wife claims he threatened to kill her in bombshell court documents
text:

Jeremy Renner 's ex-wife has claimed he stuck a gun in his own mouth and threatened to kill her in new court documents, it's been reported in the US.

The Avengers star, 48, who plays superhero Hawkeye in the Marvel movies, is alleged to have been using alcohol and cocaine when he began talking about killing his ex Sonni Pacheco.

She claims the night ended with him shoving a gun in his own mouth and threatening to kill himself.

In legal documents obtained by TMZ , Sonni claims that in November last year, Jeremy was at a club, high on cocaine and booze, when he began talking about killing her, and telling someone he "could not deal with her anymore", and he "just wanted her gone".

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: GC Images)

The former couple had previously agreed joint custody of their daughter Ava, six, but now, Sonni is asking the judge for sole custody and for Jeremy's visits to be monitored.

These new documents claim that on that night in November, Jeremy put a gun in his mouth, threatened to kill himself and fired the gun into the ceiling while Ava was asleep in her bedroom.

Sonni also claims Jeremy has a history of substance abuse, as well as verbal and emotional abuse, and that he had been under the influence a number of times while in physical custody of Ava.

The court documents also state Jeremy once left cocaine on a bathroom counter where Ava could have reached it.

Sonni also alleges that the nanny once overheard Jeremy saying he was going to Sonni's house to kill her and then kill himself because "it was better that Ava had no parents than to have [Sonni] as a mother".

But the actor says his ex's side of the story is dramatised and that she has a "specific goal in mind".

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

A representative for Jeremy told the publication: "The well-being of his daughter Ava has always been and continues to be the primary focus for Jeremy. This is a matter for the court to decide. It's important to note the dramatisations made in Sonni's declaration are a one-sided account made with a specific goal in mind."

Mirror Online has contacted Jeremy's representatives for comment.
description: The Avengers star is alleged to have been using alcohol and cocaine when he began talking about killing his ex-wife Sonni
